description:
A simple protection policy for boulderers and their budgets. The Session II features sandwich-style and layered foam construction for durability and nice absorption. Angled hinge design provides a safe and hard-wearing folding point without an unfortunate gutter.

  • Burly polyester body and top fabric
  • Flap closure reverses to cover shoulder straps while bouldering
  • Padded shoulder straps and a waistbelt make for comfortable toting over contorted ground
  • Carpeted shoe-cleaning surface
  • Two drag handles allow for easy positioning once open
name: Metolius Session II Crash Pad
